column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////There is a Spanish aphorism that I love
column2: "Tapas are tiny presents for happy drunks." Â Whether you're drinking or not
column3: tapas does feel like little presents and Cafe Ba Ba Reba knows how to throw a great party. Mercat is more refined and authentic
column4: but sometimes you just want to have fun. Cafe Ba Ba Reba is festive and bustling. And it's Lettuce Entertain You so you get points.
